verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe שׁוֹדֵ֗ד <WH7703> to thee that spoilest וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not שָׁד֔וּד <WH7703> and thou [wast] not spoiled וּבוֹגֵ֖ד <WH898> and dealest treacherously וְלֹא־ <WH3808> while did not בָ֣גְדוּ <WH898> and they dealt not treacherously ב֑וֹ כַּהֲתִֽמְךָ֤ <WH8552> with thee when thou shalt cease שׁוֹדֵד֙ <WH7703> to spoil תּוּשַּׁ֔ד <WH7703> thou shalt be spoiled כַּנְּלֹתְךָ֥ <WH5239> [and] when thou shalt make an end לִבְגֹּ֖ד <WH898> to deal treacherously יִבְגְּדוּ־ <WH898> they shall deal treacherously בָֽךְ׃ ס

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD חָנֵּ֖נוּ <WH2603> be gracious לְךָ֣ קִוִּ֑ינוּ <WH6960> unto us we have waited הֱיֵ֤ה <WH1961> become זְרֹעָם֙ <WH2220> for thee be thou their arm לַבְּקָרִ֔ים <WH1242> every morning אַף־ <WH637> also יְשׁוּעָתֵ֖נוּ <WH3444> our salvation בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> also in the time צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> of trouble

מִקּ֣וֹל <WH6963> At the noise הָמ֔וֹן <WH1995> of the tumult נָדְד֖וּ <WH5074> fled עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> the people מֵר֣וֹמְמֻתֶ֔ךָ <WH7427> at the lifting up נָפְצ֖וּ <WH5310> were scattered גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of thyself the nations

וְאֻסַּ֣ף <WH622> shall be gathered שְׁלַלְכֶ֔ם <WH7998> And your spoil אֹ֖סֶף <WH625> [like] the gathering הֶֽחָסִ֑יל <WH2625> of the caterpiller כְּמַשַּׁ֥ק <WH4944> as the running to and fro גֵּבִ֖ים <WH1357> of locusts שׁוֹקֵ֥ק <WH8264> shall he run בּֽוֹ׃

נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH7682> is exalted יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֹׁכֵ֖ן <WH7931> for he dwelleth מָר֑וֹם <WH4791> on high מִלֵּ֣א <WH4390> he hath filled צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> Zion מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> with judgment וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> and righteousness

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become אֱמוּנַ֣ת <WH530> shall be the stability עִתֶּ֔יךָ <WH6256> of thy times חֹ֥סֶן <WH2633> [and] strength יְשׁוּעֹ֖ת <WH3444> of salvation חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> And wisdom וָדָ֑עַת <WH1847> and knowledge יִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> the fear יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הִ֥יא <WH1931> he אוֹצָרֽוֹ׃ <WH214> [is] his treasure ס

הֵ֚ן <WH2005> Behold אֶרְאֶלָּ֔ם <WH691> Behold their valiant ones צָעֲק֖וּ <WH6817> shall cry חֻ֑צָה <WH2351> without מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> the ambassadors שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> of peace מַ֖ר <WH4751> bitterly יִבְכָּיֽוּן׃ <WH1058> shall weep

נָשַׁ֣מּוּ <WH8074> lie waste מְסִלּ֔וֹת <WH4546> The highways שָׁבַ֖ת <WH7673> ceaseth עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> the traveler אֹ֑רַח <WH734> manner הֵפֵ֤ר <WH6565> he hath broken בְּרִית֙ <WH1285> the covenant מָאַ֣ס <WH3988> he hath despised עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> the cities לֹ֥א <WH3808> has no חָשַׁ֖ב <WH2803> he regardeth אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH376> he

אָבַ֤ל <WH56> mourneth אֻמְלְלָה֙ <WH535> [and] languisheth אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> The earth הֶחְפִּ֥יר <WH2659> is ashamed לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> Lebanon קָמַ֑ל <WH7060> [and] hewn down הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <WH8289> Sharon כָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> is like a wilderness וְנֹעֵ֥ר <WH5287> shake off בָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> and Bashan וְכַרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> and Carmel

עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> Now אָק֖וּם <WH6965> Now will I rise יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now אֵֽרוֹמָ֔ם <WH7311> bring up עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now אֶנָּשֵֽׂא׃ <WH5375> now will I lift up

תַּהֲר֥וּ <WH2029> Ye shall conceive חֲשַׁ֖שׁ <WH2842> chaff תֵּ֣לְדוּ <WH3205> ye shall bring forth קַ֑שׁ <WH7179> stubble רוּחֲכֶ֕ם <WH7307> your breath אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> [as] fire תֹּאכַלְכֶֽם׃ <WH398> shall devour

וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> And the people מִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <WH4955> shall be [as] the burnings שִׂ֑יד <WH7875> of lime קוֹצִ֥ים <WH6975> [as] thorns כְּסוּחִ֖ים <WH3683> cut up בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> in the fire יִצַּֽתּוּ׃ <WH3341> shall they be burned ס

שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hear רְחוֹקִ֖ים <WH7350> ye [that are] far off אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> what I have done וּדְע֥וּ <WH3045> acknowledge קְרוֹבִ֖ים <WH7138> and ye [that are] near גְּבֻרָתִֽי׃ <WH1369> my might

פָּחֲד֤וּ <WH6342> are afraid בְצִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> in Zion חַטָּאִ֔ים <WH2400> The sinners אָחֲזָ֥ה <WH270> hath surprised רְעָדָ֖ה <WH7461> fearfulness חֲנֵפִ֑ים <WH2611> the hypocrites מִ֣י ׀ <WH4310> Who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> Who among us shall dwell לָ֗נוּ אֵ֚שׁ <WH784> burning אוֹכֵלָ֔ה <WH398> with the devouring מִי־ <WH4310> Who יָג֥וּר <WH1481> live לָ֖נוּ מוֹקְדֵ֥י <WH4168> burning עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> with everlasting

הֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> He that walketh צְדָק֔וֹת <WH6666> righteously וְדֹבֵ֖ר <WH1696> and speaketh מֵֽישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> uprightly מֹאֵ֞ס <WH3988> he that despiseth בְּבֶ֣צַע <WH1215> the gain מַעֲשַׁקּ֗וֹת <WH4642> of oppressions נֹעֵ֤ר <WH5287> that shaketh כַּפָּיו֙ <WH3709> his hands מִתְּמֹ֣ךְ <WH8551> from holding בַּשֹּׁ֔חַד <WH7810> of bribes אֹטֵ֤ם <WH331> that stoppeth אָזְנוֹ֙ <WH241> his ears מִשְּׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> from hearing דָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> of blood וְעֹצֵ֥ם <WH6105> and shutteth עֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> his eyes מֵרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> from seeing בְּרָֽע׃ <WH7451> evil

ה֚וּא <WH1931> he מְרוֹמִ֣ים <WH4791> on high יִשְׁכֹּ֔ן <WH7931> He shall dwell מְצָד֥וֹת <WH4679> [shall be] the munitions סְלָעִ֖ים <WH5553> of rocks מִשְׂגַּבּ֑וֹ <WH4869> his place of defence לַחְמ֣וֹ <WH3899> bread נִתָּ֔ן <WH5414> shall be given מֵימָ֖יו <WH4325> him his waters נֶאֱמָנִֽים׃ <WH539> [shall be] sure

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּיָפְי֖וֹ <WH3308> in his beauty תֶּחֱזֶ֣ינָה <WH2372> shall see עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> Thine eyes תִּרְאֶ֖ינָה <WH7200> they shall behold אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land מַרְחַקִּֽים׃ <WH4801> that is very far off

לִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> Thine heart יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> shall meditate אֵימָ֑ה <WH367> terror אַיֵּ֤ה <WH346> Where סֹפֵר֙ <WH5608> Where [is] the scribe אַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> Where שֹׁקֵ֔ל <WH8254> ? where [is] the receiver אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> Where סֹפֵ֥ר <WH5608> ? where [is] he that counted אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּגְדָּלִֽים׃ <WH4026> castle

אֶת־ <WH853> עַ֥ם <WH5971> people נוֹעָ֖ז <WH3267> a fierce לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no תִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> Thou shalt not see עַ֣ם <WH5971> a people עִמְקֵ֤י <WH6012> of a deeper שָׂפָה֙ <WH8193> speech מִשְּׁמ֔וֹעַ <WH8085> than thou canst perceive נִלְעַ֥ג <WH3932> of a stammering לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> tongue אֵ֥ין <WH369> no בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> [that thou canst] not understand

חֲזֵ֣ה <WH2372> Look צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> upon Zion קִרְיַ֖ת <WH7151> the city מֽוֹעֲדֵ֑נוּ <WH4150> of our solemnities עֵינֶיךָ֩ <WH5869> thine eyes תִרְאֶ֨ינָה <WH7200> shall see יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> Jerusalem נָוֶ֣ה <WH5116> habitation שַׁאֲנָ֗ן <WH7600> a quiet אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> a tabernacle בַּל־ <WH1077> Nor יִצְעָן֙ <WH6813> [that] shall not be taken down בַּל־ <WH1077> Nor יִסַּ֤ע <WH5265> be removed יְתֵֽדֹתָיו֙ <WH3489> not one of the stakes לָנֶ֔צַח <WH5331> thereof shall ever וְכָל־ <WH3605> any חֲבָלָ֖יו <WH2256> neither shall any of the cords בַּל־ <WH1077> Nor יִנָּתֵֽקוּ׃ <WH5423> thereof be broken

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> there אַדִּ֤יר <WH117> But there the glorious יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> LORD לָ֔נוּ מְקוֹם־ <WH4725> [will be] unto us a place נְהָרִ֥ים <WH5104> rivers יְאֹרִ֖ים <WH2975> [and] streams רַחֲבֵ֣י <WH7342> wide יָדָ֑יִם <WH3027> which בַּל־ <WH1077> no תֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> will go בּוֹ֙ אֳנִי־ <WH590> galley שַׁ֔יִט <WH7885> with oars וְצִ֥י <WH6716> ship אַדִּ֖יר <WH117> neither shall gallant לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יַעַבְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5674> pass

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD שֹׁפְטֵ֔נוּ <WH8199> [is] our judge יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מְחֹקְקֵ֑נוּ <WH2710> [is] our lawgiver יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD מַלְכֵּ֖נוּ <WH4428> [is] our king ה֥וּא <WH1931> He יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3467> he will save

נִטְּשׁ֖וּ <WH5203> are loosed חֲבָלָ֑יִךְ <WH2256> Thy tacklings בַּל־ <WH1077> cannot יְחַזְּק֤וּ <WH2388> strengthen כֵן־ <WH3651> of its תָּרְנָם֙ <WH8650> their mast בַּל־ <WH1077> Nor פָּ֣רְשׂוּ <WH6566> they could not spread נֵ֔ס <WH5251> the sail אָ֣ז <WH227> Then חֻלַּ֤ק <WH2505> divided עַֽד־ <WH5706> then is the prey שָׁלָל֙ <WH7998> spoil מַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH4766> of a great פִּסְחִ֖ים <WH6455> the lame בָּ֥זְזוּ <WH962> take בַֽז׃ <WH957> the prey

וּבַל־ <WH1077> and no יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> shall not say שָׁכֵ֖ן <WH7934> And the inhabitant חָלִ֑יתִי <WH2470> I am sick הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwell בָּ֖הּ נְשֻׂ֥א <WH5375> therein [shall be] forgiven עָוֹֽן׃ <WH5771> [their] iniquity
